content: ग्रथित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [ग्रंथ् संदर्भे क्त नलोपः] {@--1@} Strung or tied together. {@--2@} Composed; कालिदासग्रथितवस्तुना नाटकेन <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> वर्णैः कतिपयैरेव ग्रथितस्य स्वरैरिव <ls>Śi. 2. 72.</ls> {@--3@} Arranged, classed. {@--4@} Thickened, coagulated. {@--5@} Knotty. {@--6@} Hardened. {@--7@} Hurt, injured. {@--8@} Seized, taken possession of. {@--9@} Overcome. --तं A tumor with hard knots.
